Improvements.Description: There are several instances in the method where the code checks the same condition twice, such as CONFIGURATION.shouldSummarizeOverflow(this.originalAppenderName) and !isBufferPutSuccessful. These conditions should be checked only once and the results stored for use throughout the method.

Improvements.Improvement: Use Map.computeIfAbsent() to replace conditional put in map
Improvements.Description: Instead of checking if a key exists in the map, and if not, adding it, use the computeIfAbsent() method which performs this operation atomically and is more readable.
